data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mostovski, Mike B. (2016): Metopina Macquart (Diptera: Phoridae) of Israel, with description of a new species, new records and an identification key. Zootaxa 4111 (1): 61-68, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4111.1.5
